mapper.select: select * from shop_member order by mno desc
mapper.insert: insert into shop_member values( (select nvl(max(mno),0)+1 from shop_member), #{mid}, #{mpw}, #{mname}, #{mtel}, #{maddress}, #{memail}, #{mnick}, #{mcash}, #{mpoint}, #{mgrade}, sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.select: select count(*) from shop_member where mid=#{mid}
mapper.update: update shop_member set mpw=#{mpw}, mtel=#{mtel}, maddress=#{maddress}, memail=#{memail}, mnick=#{mnick}, mcash=#{mcash}, mpoint=#{mpoint}, mgrade=#{mgrade} where mid=#{mid}
